resources.string: Tap right side of to move to next page,\n left side to go back
This is my dog Charlotte, She is a 1.5 year old Golden Doodle that loves to annoy me and my family

My name is Nicholas Simon. I am a computer science major currently attending the University of Massachusetts Lowell and am in my first senior semester. I was born in Norwood Massachusetts and have lived in Westwood Massachusetts for the vast majority of my life. I have no idea what I want to be coming out of college but hopefully it\'s something involving my degree. I enjoy fishing and playing video games with my friends in my free time.
I\'ve been sitting on a large investment in Cisco for a few years, here\'s my current ytd earnings:
